channel.title: xbox on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in xbox on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-23
item.description: Netflix bleeds subscribers in US and Canada, with no sign of recovery (3 minute read) Netflix lost 430,000 subscribers in the US and Canada in the second quarter.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-16
item.description: Windows 11 leak reveals new UI, Start menu, and more (3 minute read) An early version of Windows 11 has leaked online ahead of its unveiling on June 24.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-25
item.description: Google now lets you password-protect the page that shows all your searches (2 minute read) Google users now have the option to add a password to their Web and Activity page.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-20
item.description: Microsoft’s ‘Netflix-for-gaming’ service launches on iPhone and PC this week (2 minute read) Microsoft’s Xbox Cloud Gaming service will roll out in beta on iOS and PCs this week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-20
item.description: ‘Apple Music TV’ Launches in U.S. (1 minute read) Apple has just launched Apple Music TV, a 24-hour stream of music videos, live shows, and events.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-17
item.description: Microsoft to launch xCloud streaming free with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate in September (6 minute read) Microsoft will launch xCloud free to its Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers in September.
